!language | dak0: im useing kdm and i want to use GDM as this was a fail down to the user is there a way that i can get back into GDM with out removeing KDE's desktop im runing 11.04 and im suck on trying to get back
try: sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm; it should pop up a screen asking you to select a display manager
Can some one help with this? http://paste.ubuntu.com/822841/
it should ask you the question after: sudo apt-get install gdm;
I understand that, but you said you wanted to use gdm instead
is there some way of geting GDM
yes, installing it: sudo apt-get install gdm;
although, on oneiric, the default is actually lightdm, so if you want to go back to what you had in a default install, it would be lightdm instead
sudo dpkg-reconfigure lightdm; if lightdm is still installed
